title: g_service
author: g_service
content: We offer virtual cards.Can be used for the following services:▪️ Amazon▪️ eBay▪️ Paypal▪️ AppalPay▪️ GooglePay▪️ Netflix▪️ Spotifyand other popular services⚠️ All virtual cards are issued by accounts that belong to us.   The data is not stolen!!!⭐️Europe⭐️✅ VCC▪️ Balance 1$▪️ Valid 24 hours💰 Price - 9$✅ VCC▪️ Balance 1$▪️ Valid 21 days💰 Price - 18$✅ VCC▪️ Balance 5 - 50$▪️ Valid 21 days💰 Price - 20$ + 5% of the balance⭐️US⭐️✅ VCC▪️ Balance 1$▪️ Valid 24 hours💰 Price - 15$⭐️OTHER COUNTRIES⭐️✅ VCC▪️ Balance 0$▪️ Valid 24 hours💰 Price - 6$✅ VCC▪️ Balance 1$▪️ Valid 24 hours💰 Price - 7$Contacts:Telegram: @world_walletN1Payment methods:▪️ Cryptocurrency - BTC, LTC, USTD TRC20▪️ WISE▪️ Payoneer▪️ PayPal▪️ Payeer✅ Agree to Escrow service
